issue.title: [CF 885] ElvUI Cooldown Support
issue.body:
Can you guys please add support for ElvUI's cooldown script when using (Show Timer Text)

You can download ElvUI here
http://www.tukui.org/dl.php


> Posted by CurseForge user deadca7 | Imported from CurseForge issue #885 | Raw

comments.body:
This is already supported and has been for a long time. Use the Show Elvui Timer Text option.

Edited Nov 7, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
